title: 5 Simple Ways to Delete a Post on Instagram

steps.title: Open Instagram.
steps.content: Open Instagram. The Instagram icon is a multicolored camera front. Click the icon, which will open your Instagram home page if you're logged in. Log in if you haven't already.

steps.title: Make sure that you are on a mobile device.
steps.content: Make sure that you are on a mobile device. You can only post and delete your posts if you are on a mobile device. It doesn't work if you are on a computer. You can view your posts on a computer, however.

steps.title: Click the post that you want to delete.
steps.content: Click the post that you want to delete. Reconsider deleting the post. If it has many likes and several comments already, it might be a bit hard to delete it. Think twice before removing it.

steps.title: Click the ⋮ on the top-right corner of the post.
steps.content: Click the ⋮ on the top-right corner of the post. It'll open a subpage with several options.

steps.title: Choose the Delete option.
steps.content: Choose the Delete option. After clicking the option, you'll get a notification, which asks you to confirm whether you want to delete it. Confirm it again if you're sure.
